text:
@Worldometers Millions rely on your site and very important decisions are based on the data that you publish.

You have a big responsibility in this crisis.
Please take this finally seriously and start reporting correct statistics. And be transparent who you are.
https://t.co/baLyRWCnTs

domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]
domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain
